channel.title: Porthosts help VPS
channel.description: Alright, i bought a bronze server from porthosts.com does anyone else use this website for a VPS? I bought this maybe 15 mins ago. It still says it's pending to accept my payment. How long does this shit take for a nigga? Here's the proof I bought it: http://prntscr.com/16y2ki

item.title: Porthosts help VPS
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You cannot expect us to know anything about your vps. We can’t do anything about this issue.
90% of VPS problems are to be asked on their forums, or with their customer support.
This would be one of those things.

Read full topic
